resources.string: Password too short, enter minimum 6 characters!
Authentication failed, check your email and password or sign up
Not a member? Get registered now!
We just need your registered Email Id to sent you password reset instructions.
Just pour a cup of baking soda in with the wash and your clothes will come out even brighter and cleaner !
Tie some Eucalyptus to your showerhead.It will make an amazing fragrance with the steam.
If you want to convert Celsius to Fahrenheit, just multiply the temperature by 1.8 and then add 32 to the product.
When using a public restroom, putting toilet paper in the bowl before using the bathroom will eliminate most noise.
Need to cook a whole bunch of hot dogs at once? Toss them all in a Crock - Pot.
When eating pizza,flip it upside down so the cheese gets maximun contact with your taste buds.
When you add cream, coffee stays warm 20% longer
Warp your meat in cabbage to prevent the burning of meat while cooking!
Repeat last command in Excel pressing F4 in Excel repeats the last Command.
Running low on battery? Put your phone on Airplane mode and it will charge much faster!
If you want to download a Youtube video, just add "ss" to the URL between www. and Youtube
White noise works as magic for babies.You can use some great apps from the Apple or Google Play stores to make them clam and sleep
When its after 2 am,just go to sleep.Because the decisions you make after 2 am are almost the wrong decisions.
Accidentally text the wrong person? Immediately put your phone on airplane mode and once it fails to deliver,delete the message.
Don’t make decisions when you’re angry. Don’t make promises when you’re happy.
Never attribute to malice that which can be adequately explained by stupidity.
